nodes.text: Coruscant Medical was a medical center on the planet Coruscant. After being severely wounded on the planet Haruun Kal, the Korun, Nick Rostu, was treated at Coruscant Medical where his life was saved by the finest medical treatment available, a luxury assured by the Jedi Council. While he recovered in the center, the Jedi, Mace Windu, visited him a number of times.
